name: Pump Controller
author: minida28
disc: Pump Controller Based on Arduino and esp-link.

comments.author: manohar
comments.text: hi you tried different way to representing charts, can you se d the js code of all.  and can make the step line chart instead of line chart for motor turn on and off. my mail: bom.manu16@gmail.com

comments.author: minida28
comments.text: Hello, thanks for your comment. I'm not quite sure what you mean with changing the chart into a step line type, but as far as I know, the standard type of chart in Thingspeak are limited to only line, bar, column and spline type.Cheers,
